QuestData.Title: Balance
QuestData.Description: The story did not end happily. The Narsong crocolisk is no more.$b$bThis time, however, you may have a chance to change the ending.$b$bThe hozen to the south are overfishing these waters. With the fish gone, the crocolisks are hungry and desperate - and so they attack Marista.$b$bGo now, $r! Stop those hozen from their reckless fishing!
QuestData.RewardText: <Jay listens to your account of the day's events.>$b$bI see. We'll keep an eye on the Ungas from here. And we'll do our best not to fish these waters too heavily, either. No doubt we're part of the problem, too.$b$bUntil next time, $n.
